definitions.body: of men (55 t.), [[שִׂמְלָתוֹ לְעׂרוֹ]] Ex 22:26 (E), [[פָּנׇיו]] ´[[ע]] Ex 34:29, Ex 34:30 cf. v:Ex 34:35 (all P); (dark) skin of Cushite Je 13:23; v. also Ez Eze 37:6, Eze 37:8, La 3:8, Job 7:5, Job 10:11, +; in hyperb. Mic 3:2, Mic 3:3; [[עוֹר שִׁנׇּ֑י]] Job 19:20 b the skin of my teeth, i.e. gums (si vera l.); also Le 13:2 + 33 t. Le 13 (P), in tests for leprosy (v. esp. [[־בְּשָׂרוֹ]]´[[ע]] v:Le 13:2, v:Le 13:2, v:Le 13:3, v:Le 13:4, v:Le 13:11, cf. v:Le 13:3, v:Le 13:38, v:Le 13:39, v:Le 13:43); [[עוֹר בְּעַד עוֹר]] Job 2:4 skin in behalf of, for, skin, appar. proverb. phrase of barter, = everything has its price (on varieties of interpr. v. Comm.).

hide of animals (44 t.), alw.—exc. Job 40:31—after skinning: Ge 27:16 (J); of sacrif. victims Ex 29:14, Le 4:11 + 5 t. (all P); prepared for use (by some process of tanning, cf. Now:Arch. i. 242), sts. = leather: material of garments Ge 3:21 (J), girdle 2Ki 1:8, any article Le 11:32, Le 13:48 ff Nu 31:20 (P); covering of tabern. Ex 25:5, Ex 25:5 + 10 t. Ex 26, Ex 35, Ex 36, Ex 39, of ark, sacred utensils, etc., Nu 4:6 + 5 t. Nu 4.
